credentials.title: Login
credentials.signupBtn: Don't yet have an account? Sign up.

verificationCode.title: Verify your identity
verificationCode.info: Please enter the six digit code we have sent to your email address. If you cannot find it in your inbox, please also check the SPAM folder or send a new code with the button below.

errors.accountOrPassword: Something has gone wrong. Check your email address and password.
errors.wrongCode: Wrong code. Check the code we emailed you.
errors.newCodeSent: Wrong code. We have emailed you a new code.
errors.rateLimit: You will need to wait a while before you can request a new code.
errors.unknown: Something has gone wrong. Check your information or try again later.

signup.title: Sign up
signup.informedConsentCheckbox: I have read and accept the <1>privacy statement</1>.*
signup.reCaptchaCookieCheckbox: I agree to this site utilizing <1>Google’s tracking cookies</1> for spam protection using reCAPTCHA.*
signup.loginLink: Have an account already? Login in here.
signup.reCaptchaLinks: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google <1>Privacy Policy</1> and <3>Terms of Service</3> apply.

errors.passwordRules: Your password must have at least 8 characters and contain 3 of the following 4 elements: lowercase letters, capital letters, numbers, punctuation marks.
errors.passwordMatch: The passwords are not the same
errors.invalidEmail: Your email address seems to be incorrect

privacyConsent.title: Privacy Consent
privacyConsent.acceptBtn: I read and accept the above statement.

recaptchaConsent.title: ReCaptcha Cookie Consent
recaptchaConsent.acceptBtn: I read and accept the above statement.

signupSuccess.title: Welcome!
signupSuccess.successMsg:
You are almost signed up for Infectieradar.be! 

 First confirm your email address by clicking on the link in the confirmation email that we have sent you 
 If you can’t find the email, first check your spam folder. You can also request a new email below.
signupSuccess.wrongEmailBtn: Did you use the wrong email address? Then change it here.

passwordForgotten.title: Change password
passwordForgotten.info: Enter the email address of your account
passwordForgotten.successMessage:
Follow the link in the email we have sent you at the address below.
 If you haven’t received an email, check your spam folder or try again if possible.

errors.invalidId: Something has gone wrong. Check your email address or connection./n You can have another try when the button is visible again.
errors.unknown: Something has gone wrong. Check your information or try again later.
